text:
Originally reported by: **Claudiu Popa (BitBucket: [PCManticore](http://bitbucket.org/PCManticore), GitHub: @PCManticore)**

---

We should understand when a variable was deleted inside a branch and used later on. This issue requires some work in pylint as well.

---
- Bitbucket: https://bitbucket.org/logilab/astroid/issue/132
title: [flow control] Understand deletions of variables
